english.segment1: Divided devotion, controlled passion, And theories of purity that remain hypotheses, Plural allegiances, and dual monogamy, These lies are the ghosts that haunt the. Graveyard of normality.
english.segment2: I'm cutting compromise from today's routine. Hold fast to integrity, I won't let it go.
english.segment4: Honesty, these luxuries I have left behind. And I'm on my way.
